justification: Rationale focuses on Team A only and ignores Team B’s risk-seeking, rookie-upside mindset. It inaccurately calls Brandon Taylor a “top TE” and overlooks Team A’s injury aversion while requesting a questionable Josh Martin. The trade is structurally plausible (A upgrades TE depth and swaps RBs; B gains a high-ceiling rookie WR), but the reasoning is generic and thin on scenario-specific details.
